Reset Admin credentials for Web Author

body.p:
To reset the admin user credentials that are used to access the Administration Page in , follow these steps:
Delete the shiro-users.ini file located in the Oxygen Data Directory.
Restart the server.
In your browser, go to the Dashboard page (for example, http://example.com:8080/oxygen-webapp/app/oxygen.html or the Admininstration Page (for example, http://example.com:8080/oxygen-webapp/app/admin.html) and you will be redirected to a configuration page.
Enter your new credentials.
